document.full_text: some 10,000 georgians rallied in tbilisi demanding president mikheil saakashvili resign, while in the southwestern town of batumi a witness said demonstrators tried to break into a television building.
document.title: georgian protests, tv building attacked
lines_and_colors: some 10,000 georgians rallied in tbilisi demanding president mikheil saakashvili resign, while in the southwestern town of batumi a witness said demonstrators tried to break into a television building.
